thread.section_title: Paris Marriott Opera Ambassador Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Stay
thread.title_full: Great Stay - Review of Paris Marriott Opera Ambassador Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jamescrongeyer
title: Great Stay
text: We stayed for 7 nights. Our group had 4 rooms. Everything was perfect. We ate in the restaurant and spent time in the Executve Lounge. We interacted with the concierge desk on multiple occasions. We also spent a number of evenings in the hotel bar. The staff across all areas was accommodating and friendly. Our rooms were immaculate and well maintained. Location was awesome. We will return when we are in Paris again. Top notch!!!
